languages.text: {n}Нежная ладонь Кассии касается вашей щеки.{/n} "Быть здесь, рядом с вами, делить на двоих последние мгновения спокойствия перед неизбежностью... Если кому-то из нас суждено погибнуть в предстоящей битве, знайте — я буду искать вас в следующих жизнях. До тех пор, пока вновь не найду".

{n}Cassia's palm gently rests on your cheek.{/n} "To be here with you, to share the last moments of peace before the inevitable... If either of us should die in the coming battle, know that I will look for you in the next life. Until I find you again."
languages.original_text: {n}Нежная ладонь Кассии касается вашей щеки.{/n} "Быть здесь, рядом с вами, делить на двоих последние мгновения спокойствия перед неизбежностью... Если кому-то из нас суждено погибнуть в предстоящей битве, знайте — я буду искать вас в следующих жизнях. До тех пор, пока вновь не найду".

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia's gentle palm rests on your cheek.{/n} "To be here with you, to share the last moments of peace before the inevitable... If either of us should die in the coming battle, know that I will look for you in the next life. Until I find you again."

{n}Cassia's gentle palm rests on your cheek.{/n} "To be here with you, to share the last moments of peace before the inevitable... If either of us should die in the coming battle, know that I will look for you in the next life. Until I find you again."

{n}Cassia's palm gently rests on your cheek.{/n} "To be here with you, to share the last moments of peace before the inevitable... If either of us should die in the coming battle, know that I will look for you in the next life. Until I find you again."

{n}Cassia's palm gently rests on your cheek.{/n} "To be here with you, to share the last moments of peace before the inevitable... If either of us should die in the coming battle, know that I will look for you in the next life. Until I find you again."

{n}Cassia's palm gently rests on your cheek.{/n} "To be here with you, to share the last moments of peace before the inevitable... If either of us should die in the coming battle, know that I will look for you in the next life. Until I find you again."

languages.text: {n}卡西娅轻轻将手抚在你的脸上。{/n}“与你在一起，在不可避免的结局到来之前，与你一起享受这片刻的宁静……如果我们之中有谁在这场战斗中死亡，我会在来世不断寻找你，直到我再次找到你。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's palm gently rests on your cheek.{/n} "To be here with you, to share the last moments of peace before the inevitable... If either of us should die in the coming battle, know that I will look for you in the next life. Until I find you again."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅轻轻将手抚在你的脸上。{/n}“与你在一起，在不可避免的结局到来之前，与你一起享受这片刻的宁静……如果我们之中有谁在这场战斗中死亡，我会在来世不断寻找你，直到我再次找到你。”

languages.text: {n}Cassia acaricia tu mejilla con cariño.{/n} «Estar aquí, a tu lado, compartiendo los últimos momentos de paz antes de que llegue lo inevitable... Si alguno de nosotros muriera en la batalla que nos aguarda, quiero que sepas que pasaré mi próxima vida buscándote, hasta que vuelva a encontrarte».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's palm gently rests on your cheek.{/n} "To be here with you, to share the last moments of peace before the inevitable... If either of us should die in the coming battle, know that I will look for you in the next life. Until I find you again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia acaricia tu mejilla con cariño.{/n} «Estar aquí, a tu lado, compartiendo los últimos momentos de paz antes de que llegue lo inevitable... Si alguno de nosotros muriera en la batalla que nos aguarda, quiero que sepas que pasaré mi próxima vida buscándote, hasta que vuelva a encontrarte».

languages.text: {n}カシアの手のひらがそっと頬を伝う。{/n}「あなたの傍にいる、避けられない運命が迫る前に最後の平穏な時間を共有する...もし私たちのどちらかがこの先の戦いで命尽きることになっても、必ず来世であなたを探し続けます...もう一度あなたに逢えるまで」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's palm gently rests on your cheek.{/n} "To be here with you, to share the last moments of peace before the inevitable... If either of us should die in the coming battle, know that I will look for you in the next life. Until I find you again."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアの手のひらがそっと頬を伝う。{/n}「あなたの傍にいる、避けられない運命が迫る前に最後の平穏な時間を共有する...もし私たちのどちらかがこの先の戦いで命尽きることになっても、必ず来世であなたを探し続けます...もう一度あなたに逢えるまで」

languages.text: {n}Cassias Handfläche ruht sanft auf deiner Wange.{/n} "Hier mit Euch zu sein, die letzten Augenblicke des Friedens vor dem Unvermeidlichen zu erleben ... Sollte einer von uns beiden in dem kommenden Kampf fallen, so seid versichert: Ich werde Euch im nächsten Leben suchen. Bis ich Euch wiederfinde."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's palm gently rests on your cheek.{/n} "To be here with you, to share the last moments of peace before the inevitable... If either of us should die in the coming battle, know that I will look for you in the next life. Until I find you again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassias Handfläche ruht sanft auf deiner Wange.{/n} "Hier mit Euch zu sein, die letzten Augenblicke des Friedens vor dem Unvermeidlichen zu erleben ... Sollte einer von uns beiden in dem kommenden Kampf fallen, so seid versichert: Ich werde Euch im nächsten Leben suchen. Bis ich Euch wiederfinde."

languages.text: {n}La paume de Cassia se pose doucement sur votre joue.{/n} « Être ici avec vous, partager les derniers instants de paix avant l'inéluctable... Si l'{mf|un|une} de nous doit périr dans la bataille à venir, sachez que je passerai ma prochaine vie à vous chercher. Je n'aurai de cesse que je vous retrouve. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's palm gently rests on your cheek.{/n} "To be here with you, to share the last moments of peace before the inevitable... If either of us should die in the coming battle, know that I will look for you in the next life. Until I find you again."

Si l'{mf|un|une} de nous doit périr dans la bataille à venir, sachez que je passerai ma prochaine vie à vous chercher. Je n'aurai de cesse que je vous retrouve. »
